title: France wants EU-wide carbon tax, finance minister says
text:
France wants EU-wide carbon tax, finance minister says

Economy 9 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 07:16AM ET)

PARIS (Reuters) - France wants the European Union to have a carbon tax and will propose that a European fuel tax be imposed on airplanes and ships, French Finance Minister Bruno Le Maire said on Tuesday. Le Maire also said France would review the state's export guarantees in line with a commitment to stop financing projects that increase CO2 emissions.
